name: @feup-infolab/docker-mocha
description: Running mocha tests in isolated, parallel and cached environments
author: nuno.neto

scripts.test: cp docker-mocha-run.js ./test/docker-mocha-run.js && mkdir ./test/src; cp src/* ./test/src && node ./docker-mocha-run.js -f ./test/test/tests.json -t 2 -c ./test/docker-compose.yml -e dendro -p 3000 --config docker_mocha; rm ./test/docker-mocha-run.js; rm -rf ./test/src/
